This document describes all tests available for automated execution under
Autotest on http://cautotest.

================================================================================
Glossary
================================================================================

- $: command line prompt
- $HOME: home directory of current user.
- DUT: device under test
- Semi-Automated Test: test that runs with automation but requires manual
  intervention.
